verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Precious moments, privileged people.
Do you realize the good things God has done?
Lift your hands up and shout AMEN, friends.
To a thankful heart a double portion comes.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Precious moments, privileged people.
Yes, I realize the good things God has done.
So I'll lift my hands up and shout AMEN, friends.
To a thankful heart a double portion comes.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Momentos preciosos,
Que privilegio
Al reconocer
Lo bueno que es Dios

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Alza tus manos
Diciendo Amen
El corazon agradecido
Tendra doble porcion
